signal_description: From the table 'defaultview-197', calculate the average of the values in the 'Project_CreateToStartTime' column.
llm_output:

I then composed a simple sentence summarizing each component in plain language - retrieving the average value of the Project_CreateToStartTime column from the table called defaultview-197.
